title: How do I edit an allergy?
body:
Follow these steps to edit an allergy:
Open the patient record
Make sure you are in the "Clinical" tab 
Make sure you are in the "Allergies" section
Click the Tick-box next to the name of the allergy
Click Edit to open the allergy form
Update the form with all the required details
Click Save to close the form
The allergy has now been updated.
